## DOMViewSvc type

DOM View service type - view primitives + on + mount

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type DOMViewSvc = ViewSvc & SignalsSvc & {
    on: AddEventListener;
    mount: <TElement>(spec: RefSpec<TElement>) => NodeRef<TElement>;
};
```
**References:** [ViewSvc](../viewsvc/)<!-- -->, [SignalsSvc](../../signals/signalssvc/)<!-- -->, [AddEventListener](../addeventlistener/)<!-- -->, [RefSpec](../refspec/)<!-- -->, [NodeRef](../noderef/)

## Example


```typescript
import { createDOMView, type DOMViewSvc } from '@lattice/view/presets/dom';
import { createSignals } from '@lattice/signals/presets/core';

const signals = createSignals();
const view = createDOMView(signals());
const { el, map, on, mount } = view();
```
